rows.label: qst700601_msg0001
rows.name:
*sigh* It's no use.
This is never gonna work...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0002
rows.name: Well, look who it is! Hello again, friend!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0003
rows.name: Oh! You guys!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0004
rows.name: Marco, wasn't it?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0005
rows.name:
You were looking a bit lost there.
Need any help?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0006
rows.name: Huh? Oh, nah, not really...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0007
rows.name: You're not fooling anyone.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0008
rows.name:
You sounded really upset just now.
Don't try to pass it off as something
unimportant!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0009
rows.name:
Indeed. Why don't you tell us
the problem, Marco?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0010
rows.name:
We might even be able to do
something about it!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0011
rows.name: Hey, Adel!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0012
rows.name:
You're sticking your nose in other
people's business again. Quit it!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0013
rows.name:
Now Hikari, it always pays to help out
your fellow man. You never know when
you might need help in return.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0014
rows.name: That's...a fair point, I guess. But still...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0015
rows.name:
So Marco, care to tell us what's
on your mind?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0016
rows.name: A-all right...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0017
rows.name:
So, the other day, you lot helped
me catch a load of bugs, yeah?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0018
rows.name:
I'm really grateful to all of you, 'cos
you did an awesome job, but then I
realized I'm kinda useless by myself.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0019
rows.name:
So this time, I decided I'd have a go
all on my own. I even made these
blueprints for a bug-catching machine.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0020
rows.name: But then...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0021
rows.name: But then?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0022
rows.name:
I like tinkering with machines, so I know
the ins and outs of 'em, but I've never
made one from scratch before.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0023
rows.name:
I built everything according to plan,
but there's no guarantee it'll work.
And now I'm dead nervous about it...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0024
rows.name:
And that's what you were mumbling
to yourself about, was it?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0025
rows.name: Pretty much.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0026
rows.name:
I have to say, making a blueprint
like that is really something.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0027
rows.name:
It's clear how much time you've
invested in this endeavor.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0028
rows.name:
Huh? You know how to build stuff,
mister?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0029
rows.name: I haven't the faintest idea! Haha!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0030
rows.name: What?!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0031
rows.name: Dumbass.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0032
rows.name:
Still, it's evident that you're really
serious about this.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0033
rows.name: It... It is?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0034
rows.name:
The fact that you're worried about its
success is a sign of your determination.
It's perfectly natural.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0035
rows.name:
You've a clear goal in mind, and you'll
do anything to achieve it, am I right?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0036
rows.name:
I can't see a more noble goal than that.
Just give the word and we'll help you
out.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0037
rows.name:
Have more faith in yourself, Marco,
and let's finish this thing, together!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0038
rows.name: That's so...nice of you...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0039
rows.name: OK then!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0040
rows.name:
I'm not giving up. I'll keep trying
'till I get it working just the way it's
supposed to!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0041
rows.name:
OK, so here are the blueprints for
"Bug Catcher Turbotron BGX5000".

rows.label: qst700601_msg0042
rows.name: Bug Catcher Turbotron BGX5000?!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0043
rows.name:
What an inspired name! Now that's
something I wish I'd had when I was
a kid!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0044
rows.name:
Addam, would you shut your trap
for a moment?

rows.label: qst700601_msg0045
rows.name: Not you. You keep going.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0046
rows.name: Uh...right.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0047
rows.name:
Well, the machine itself's not quite
finished yet. I'm still missing some
parts.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0048
rows.name:
I'll prolly need about 3 Sunset Brackets
and a Charged Shaft.

rows.label: qst700601_msg0049
rows.name:
It'd be awesome if you guys could go
and pick those up for me!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0050
rows.name:
Sir, yes, sir! We'll have those parts
delivered to you on the double, sir!

rows.label: qst700601_msg0051
rows.name: Boys and their toys...

rows.label: qst700601_msg0052
rows.name:
Being nice to kids is one thing, but
this is getting beyond a joke...
